hooks.name: Resume Upload Reminder
hooks.description: Reminds about PDF format requirements when discussing file uploads

action.message: Remember: Professor Doom only accepts PDF resumes. Make sure the PDF contains selectable text, not scanned images.

hooks.name: API Key Security Check
hooks.description: Warns about API key exposure when discussing environment variables

action.message: Security reminder: Never commit .env files with API keys. Use .env.example as a template.

hooks.name: Test Reminder
hooks.description: Reminds to test API endpoints before deployment

action.message: Before deploying, test /api/test endpoint to verify Gemini API connectivity.
